public void destruct()
{
if(mySock == null) return;
try {
misc.println(“ClientHandler: Client “+playerName+” disconnected.”);
disconnected = true;

		if(in != null) in.close();
		if(out != null) out.close();
		mySock.close();
		mySock = null;
		in = null;
		out = null;
		inStream = null;
		outStream = null;
		isActive = false;
		synchronized(this) { notify(); }
		buffer = null;
	} catch(java.io.IOException ioe) {
		ioe.printStackTrace();
	}
	super.destruct();
}

[/code]
